name: BroadcastChannel
description: A unique instance of a BroadcastService on a CableOrSatelliteService lineup.
title: BroadcastChannel

fields.name: broadcastFrequency
fields.title: broadcastFrequency
fields.description: The frequency used for over-the-air broadcasts. Numeric values or simple ranges e.g. 87-99. In addition a shortcut idiom is supported for frequences of AM and FM radio channels, e.g. "87 FM".

fields.name: broadcastChannelId
fields.title: broadcastChannelId
fields.description: The unique address by which the BroadcastService can be identified in a provider lineup. In US, this is typically a number.

fields.name: broadcastServiceTier
fields.title: broadcastServiceTier
fields.description: The type of service required to have access to the channel (e.g. Standard or Premium).

fields.name: providesBroadcastService
fields.title: providesBroadcastService
fields.description: The BroadcastService offered on this channel.

fields.name: genre
fields.title: genre
fields.description: Genre of the creative work, broadcast channel or group.
